input_ref: CHAP AI v1.2 System Prompt — persona language + render rule + canonical intake
manual_intervention_reason: PM pipeline stopped at build (--stop-at). Build and deployment executed directly. Linode disk full during first build attempt — pruned 13GB of unused Docker images/cache.
notes: Updated CHAP AI v1.1 to v1.2. Three changes: (1) Canonical Item 3 language for structured data intake function listings, (2) Two new persona language avoid/use rows — casual greetings and 'smarter' framing, (3) Render Rule for conversational mode — YAML schema is internal/audit only, never rendered to user. Live test confirmed correct persona language and canonical intake wording. YAML block still rendering in response — may need application-layer stripping in chap_api.py.
